name: Shaky Ground
description:
Jump to get out of the hole. Collect items to increase your speed and jumps! Be careful the platforms blow up, so you will have to be quick! Hold down the jump button for longer jumps, or tap the jump button for short jumps. 

All assets were created by me for this game, or derivative from some of my other games. Background music created using Wolfram Tones. Sound Effects created using BFXR. Visual assets created using Aseprite, Photoshop, and Gamemaker Image Editor. Particles were created in Particle Designer. Made with Gamemaker Studio game Engine.

This game was made for Ludum-Dare 49.
